about_the_game:
You are free. The system keeping you in check has lost connection to your robot.
Trapped in the maze-like guts of a colossal oil rig you quickly pick up your weapon and try to escape your corroding prison.
Fight with your dash. Slash your way through your former crew mates. It's all about speed / time is running out.

Slice your way right into the action with simple controls.

You point, you click, you dash. Your Dash is your attack: click the enemy, defeat the enemy.
It doesn't stay that straightforward though: the enemies get trickier, their masses grow in number and your environment becomes more perilous.
Easy to learn / harder to master.

Risk everything in your attacks.

You're a Glass Cannon: destructive but prone to shatter.
However your enemies are just as fragile as you are. Will you be faster at drawing your sword and break them before they break you?
In this Instant-Death experience you should watch your step to not be caught easily. You fight alone / they are many.

Slash your enemies with precision.

Danger Alert! The oil rig fights back with everything it has.
Watch out for machinery that has been converted into combat equipment and robot workers turning against you.
The hot furnace spits its fire, oil streaks make you slip and the building is on the verge of collapse. Watch your every step / it could be your last.


Run it back.

Got knocked down? Get back up! Could you achieve a faster time? Make a run with as few dashes as possible? A combination of both? Or risk it all in chaos mode?
Keep charging in and improve your times or try out the different ways to play Bot Slash Bot. Prove yourself: you / the world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, DirectX10+ Support
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Bot Slash Bot is a fast-paced, top-down Hack n‘ Slash in which you control a rogue robot slashing & dashing through your former co-machines holding you captive! It's all about speed. Time is running out.
